name: Crazy Ducks
description:
Just a little card game where you got to match up the duckies(Or is it?).

This game was made for the Untitled Game Jam #37 with the theme: Ducks. Since this is kind of a demo of my game as well and I may add more features depending on if people like it, I submitted it for the weekly game jam indie lift as well.

Let me know what you think of the game! Feedback would be much appreciated!

Controls:

Press Q to quit the game

Point and click on the cards to flip and reveal them.

All of the art, animations, and programming were done by me!

Unity Asset used:

Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds

Casual Game Sounds - Dustyroom

Songs used:

FamiStudio Tutorial Song - NesBleuBleu https://twitter.com/nesbleubleu?lang=en

After The Rain - Shiru https://soundcloud.com/shiru8bit/after-the-rain
